[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmp6qt6s_m4\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0161.10083] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityDescription with a value of (1) a term Secured Overnight Financing Rate (“SOFR”) rate for a specified interest period plus a SOFR adjustment (equal to 0.10%) plus a margin of 1.40% or (2) base rate plus a margin of 0.40% at our option. using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 00000034 - Disclosure - Debt (Details Narrative) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityDescription was the member us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember. The member us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityDescription.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityDescription with a value of (1) a term Secured Overnight Financing Rate (“SOFR”) rate for a specified interest period plus a SOFR adjustment (equal to 0.10%) plus a margin of 1.40% or (2) base rate plus a margin of 0.40% at our option. without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityDescription is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityDescription fact are: Period :2023-03-13 to 2023-03-14 Dimensions : us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember, us-gaap:CreditFacilityAxis=us-gaap:RevolvingCreditFacilityMember Unit : None
Rule Element Id:10083 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/704562/000168316823004329/avid_i10k-043023.htm 7779

property.name: value
property.value: (1) a term Secured Overnight Financing Rate (“SOFR”) rate for a specified interest period plus a SOFR adjustment (equal to 0.10%) plus a margin of 1.40% or (2) base rate plus a margin of 0.40% at our option.

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0161.10083] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercentage with a value of 0.002 using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 00000034 - Disclosure - Debt (Details Narrative) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercentage was the member us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember. The member us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercentage.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercentage with a value of 0.002 without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercentage is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercentage fact are: Period :2023-03-13 to 2023-03-14 Dimensions : us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:SecuredOvernightFinancingRateSofrOvernightIndexSwapRateMember, us-gaap:CreditFacilityAxis=us-gaap:RevolvingCreditFacilityMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10083 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/704562/000168316823004329/avid_i10k-043023.htm 7782

property.name: label
property.value: Line of Credit Facility, Commitment Fee Percentage
